description: Priya, a 12th-grade graduate, secured a Sales Associate job at a local retail chain via Kaabil. She’s now thriving and plans to pursue further studies in business management.
name: Priya Sharma

description: Rohan, a computer science graduate, landed a Software Developer role at a tech company after completing a coding bootcamp. He’s now working on several impactful projects.
name: Rohan Verma

description: Sonia, a fresh graduate in marketing, found a marketing role at a top agency through Kaabil. She is now managing digital campaigns for several global brands.
name: Sonia Gupta
